attributes.action: introduce legislation immediately to stop police forces around the country becoming the Islamic Defence Force.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citizens of this country have a right to protest where they see that their way of life is being adversely affected, and that activity is being actively supported by a misguided government.  we cannot allow protesters against the English League Against Islam to be violated by the police forces which are paid by the people against whom they are invoking misguided and unpatriotic decisions by the current misguided and unpatriotic government.

rejection.details: There is no indication that the police is turning into an Islamic Defence Force
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
